Text: RE Red Rock Transwestern Cashflow Cc Steve The last forecast you sent the Red Rock cash flow was million the current forecast is million Please explain the difference of million This affects the TW Maketing Capital Plan for ThanksPalu Goradia ETS OSSFinancial Planning Original Message From Kalmus Steve Sent Friday November PM To Kleb Steve Goradia Pallavi Eisenstein Arnold L Hubbard Dave Jones Vera Subject Red Rock Transwestern Cashflow Here is the Red Rock cashflow File Red Rock Cashflow thru Octoberxls Steve Kalmus

RE TW Red Rock Cashflow Cc Steve The last cash flow you sent on Aug showed we would spend million on the Red Rock Expansion in This cash flow shows million to be spent in We will be include the difference of million and forecast in the Capital Plan as a carryover Please confirm the cash flow Palu Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Monday September AM To Goradia Pallavi Subject FW TW Red Rock Cashflow How does this fit in with our Capital Plan Original Message From Kleb Steve Sent Monday September AM To Geaccone Tracy Moore Jan Cc Studzinski Betty Subject FW TW Red Rock Cashflow FYI Original Message From Kalmus Steve Sent Friday September PM To Kleb Steve Cc Eisenstein Arnold L Hubbard Dave Subject TW Red Rock Cashflow Steve Here is my updated cashflow for the TW Red Rock project Please use this for your year end projections Thanks Steve Kalmus File TW Red Rock Cashflow updated thru Sept xls
